LanguageData.REGSITStool.label: REGSIT Stool
LanguageData.REGSITStool.description:
REGSIT Stool
A piece of leather and some steel - et voilà! An ingenious way of sitting, invented by the Galga Ler on Achron V.
LanguageData.REGSITStool_Blueprint.label: REGSIT Stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.REGSITStool_Blueprint_Install.label: REGSIT Stool (blueprint)

LanguageData.REGSITStool_Frame.description:
REGSIT Stool
A piece of leather and some steel - et voilà! An ingenious way of sitting, invented by the Galga Ler on Achron V.
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair.label: SITTSLAB chair
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair.description:
SITTSLAB chair
Whoever said that stone is not comfortable? Prove everyone wrong with this replica of a perfectly comfortable stony chair.
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair_Blueprint.label: SITTSLAB chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair_Blueprint_Install.label: SITTSLAB chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair_Frame.label: SITTSLAB chair (building)
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair_Frame.description:
SITTSLAB chair
Whoever said that stone is not comfortable? Prove everyone wrong with this replica of a perfectly comfortable stony chair.
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair.label: STAMMREST Chair
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair.description:
STAMMREST Chair
The STAMMREST is an authentic chair, fashioned after those found in the ruins of the Red Tree People on Xentis Ham.
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair_Blueprint.label: STAMMREST Chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair_Blueprint_Install.label: STAMMREST Chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair_Frame.label: STAMMREST Chair (building)
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair_Frame.description:
STAMMREST Chair
The STAMMREST is an authentic chair, fashioned after those found in the ruins of the Red Tree People on Xentis Ham.
LanguageData.PILREKLINCouch.label: PILREKLIN Couch
LanguageData.PILREKLINCouch.description:
PILREKLIN Couch
Recline comfortably on this carefully arranged pile of leather and fabric.

LanguageData.BUTTEKUSHPillow.label: BUTTEKUSH Pillow
LanguageData.BUTTEKUSHPillow.description:
BUTTEKUSH Pillow
Rest your tushie on this plushy cushion!

LanguageData.STAMMFLATTTable.label: STAMMFLATT Table
LanguageData.STAMMFLATTTable.description:
STAMMFLATT Table
The STAMMFLATT is a table, skillfully crafted from logs, that goes perfectly with our STAMMREST chair.
LanguageData.STAMMFLATTTable_Blueprint.label: STAMMFLATT Table (blueprint)
LanguageData.STAMMFLATTTable_Blueprint_Install.label: STAMMFLATT Table (blueprint)

STAMMFLATT Table
The STAMMFLATT is a table, skillfully crafted from logs, that goes perfectly with our STAMMREST chair.
LanguageData.SLABFLATTTable.label: SLABFLATT Table
LanguageData.SLABFLATTTable.description:
SLABFLATT Table
This splendidly designed stone table is the perfect center-piece for any dining room!
LanguageData.SLABFLATTTable_Blueprint.label: SLABFLATT Table (blueprint)
LanguageData.SLABFLATTTable_Blueprint_Install.label: SLABFLATT Table (blueprint)
LanguageData.SLABFLATTTable_Frame.label: SLABFLATT Table (building)

LanguageData.KRUDNEPPSingle.label: KRUDNEPP Single bed
LanguageData.KRUDNEPPSingle.description:
KRUDNEPP Single bed
Take a nap on the KRUDNEPP! It may look a bit rickety, but don't worry, it is perfectly safe to sleep on!*
(*for one person. RIMkea is not liable for any and all injuries sustained while using our furniture. --RIMkea, Legal Dept.)
LanguageData.KRUDNEPPSingle_Blueprint.label: KRUDNEPP Single bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.KRUDNEPPSingle_Blueprint_Install.label: KRUDNEPP Single bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.KRUDNEPPSingle_Frame.label: KRUDNEPP Single bed (building)
LanguageData.KRUDNEPPSingle_Frame.description:
KRUDNEPP Single bed
Take a nap on the KRUDNEPP! It may look a bit rickety, but don't worry, it is perfectly safe to sleep on!*
(*for one person. RIMkea is not liable for any and all injuries sustained while using our furniture. --RIMkea, Legal Dept.)
LanguageData.SLABNEPPDouble.label: SLABNEPP Double bed
LanguageData.SLABNEPPDouble.description:
SLABNEPP Double bed
This hand-crafted stone bed, showing an intricate pattern known as "Billa-of-the-Crag Knot", is as beautiful as it is comfortable (fits two people).
LanguageData.SLABNEPPDouble_Blueprint.label: SLABNEPP Double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.SLABNEPPDouble_Blueprint_Install.label: SLABNEPP Double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.SLABNEPPDouble_Frame.label: SLABNEPP Double bed (building)
LanguageData.SLABNEPPDouble_Frame.description:
SLABNEPP Double bed
This hand-crafted stone bed, showing an intricate pattern known as "Billa-of-the-Crag Knot", is as beautiful as it is comfortable (fits two people).
LanguageData.SNORHOI.label: SNORHOI animal bed
LanguageData.SNORHOI.description:
SNORHOI animal bed
"All your animals need, is your love, a bit of kibble, and a SNORHOI."* - Great Philosopher**
(*loosely translated; **Anonymous)
LanguageData.SNORHOI_Blueprint.label: SNORHOI animal bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.SNORHOI_Blueprint_Install.label: SNORHOI animal bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.SNORHOI_Frame.label: SNORHOI animal bed (building)
LanguageData.SNORHOI_Frame.description:
SNORHOI animal bed
"All your animals need, is your love, a bit of kibble, and a SNORHOI."* - Great Philosopher**
(*loosely translated; **Anonymous)
LanguageData.BOLTASKLamp.label: BOLTASK Lamp
LanguageData.BOLTASKLamp.description:
BOLTASK Lamp
A bright and warm little fire, perfectly contained in a bowl.*
(*don't leave fire unattended.)
LanguageData.BOLTASKLamp_Blueprint.label: BOLTASK Lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.BOLTASKLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: BOLTASK Lamp (blueprint)

LanguageData.KAROMUF.label: KAROMUF sculpture
LanguageData.KAROMUF.description:
KAROMUF sculpture
The holy KAROMUFF is a creature worshiped by the Cheda of the Indigo Gerbil Tribe on Alioth Posterius.
LanguageData.KAROMUF_Blueprint_Install.label: KAROMUF sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.SMOERTIGE.label: SMOERTIGE sculpture
LanguageData.SMOERTIGE.description:
SMOERTIGE sculpture
This stunning statue is a likeness of "Anha the Graceful" a matriarch of the Gray People Tribe known to be a dazzling and exquisite beauty.
LanguageData.SMOERTIGE_Blueprint_Install.label: SMOERTIGE sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.LORDOKI.label: LORDOKI sculpture
LanguageData.LORDOKI.description:
LORDOKI sculpture
This statue depicts the wolf-like god named "LORDOKI", worshiped by the Purple Lobster Crouca on Aldhafera XI
LanguageData.LORDOKI_Blueprint_Install.label: LORDOKI sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.BLUMTASK.label: BLUMTASK plant pot
LanguageData.BLUMTASK.description:
BLUMTASK plant pot
Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.
LanguageData.BLUMTASK_Blueprint.label: BLUMTASK plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.BLUMTASK_Blueprint_Install.label: BLUMTASK plant pot (blueprint)

BLUMTASK plant pot
Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.
LanguageData.aFLIKFUTRug.label: FLIKFUT Rug
LanguageData.aFLIKFUTRug.description:
FLIKFUT Rug
Five pieces of leather, fit together into a beautifully savage-looking rug to decorate your home with!

LanguageData.MATIPESSIRug.description:

A charming little rug in the style of the Abeneiro of Llama Tribe.

LanguageData.MISKANTAARug.label: MISKANTAA Rug
LanguageData.MISKANTAARug.description:
MISKANTAA Rug
This piece of art, in the form of a rug, shows a marvelous design used by the Caxigo Braga people on Achrid I.

LanguageData.HOISTEPRug.description:

Give your home that "barnyard feel" with this artfully arranged collection of hay.
